title: Beyond Meat Earnings Were Awesome. Here’s Why Its Stock Is Plunging.
text:
Beyond Meat stock was down more than 20% in Tuesday morning trading in the wake of its earnings report, but don’t blame management. Some nonfundamental factors are at work. In particular, the initial public offering lockup ends Tuesday, potentially spooking investors.

The alternative-meat pioneer reported third-quarter numbers after the close of trading Monday, and the figures were very good. The company earned 6 cents a share from $92 million in sales, marking its first profitable quarter as a publicly traded company. Sales...
description: Beyond Meat stock fell after hours trading, but don’t blame management. The alternative-mean pioneer‘s earnings report crushed Wall Street estimates, reporting its first profitable quarter as a public company.
